notifications.title: Unbelievable! Feed me!
notifications.body: It can't believe that you don't want to feed me!

notifications.title: Hello there?
notifications.body: Hello, don't you want to feed me?

notifications.title: Forgot about me?
notifications.body: Could it be that you have forgotten to feed me? I'm hungry!

notifications.title: You could never have forgotten me
notifications.body: I'm sure you'll feed me in a minute. I've been waiting here so long.

notifications.title: Hello? Feeding time...
notifications.body: Hello? I just wanted to remind you that it's feeding time.

notifications.title: Feed me! Now!
notifications.body: Feed me! Now! It's very selfish, you are just getting yourself snacks but do not care about me!

notifications.title: Wanna feed me!
notifications.body: Why don't you feed me, you arrogant human!

notifications.title: Do you want to starve me?
notifications.body: Do you want to starve me? Me? Here? Just give me a little snack!

notifications.title: Your in danger - for sure...
notifications.body: Did you know that I have a black belt in Koi Karate? Without food, I'll use it!

notifications.title: Hello Veterinary Office...
notifications.body: Hello Veterinary Office... Yes, I'm not fed here. Come quickly!

notifications.title: Wanna know a secret?
notifications.body: Could you please feed me? Then maybe I'll tell you a secret.

notifications.title: Wanna see a trick?
notifications.body: Could you please feed me? Then I'll probably show you a trick!

notifications.title: Got a promise for you!
notifications.body: If you feed me now, I will always be nice to you!

notifications.title: I love you soooo much!
notifications.body: Can you please feed me? I love you soooo much!

notifications.title: Why am I the only one not being fed?
notifications.body: Why am I the only one not being fed? All my friends are fine and fat...

notifications.title: The world is wrong
notifications.body: The world is wrong... I'm hungry...Pls, a piece of dry bread would be enough.

notifications.title: Why always me?
notifications.body: Why always me? I am so hungry. Did your that? That was my tummy...

notifications.title: Don't you love me anymore?
notifications.body: Don't you love me anymore and that's why you don't feed me?

notifications.title: Why me? Why here?
notifications.body: Why me? Why here? I do not wanna die this early...

notifications.title: Not so... Not sooooo!
notifications.body: Starving is a horrible death... Just think a bit about it...

notifications.title: You've won...
notifications.body: It's okay, let me starve.

notifications.title: Maybe you're right...
notifications.body: I'm probably not worth feeding anyway.

notifications.title: I've accepted it.
notifications.body: Let me starve, no problem for me anymore...

notifications.title: I'll be fed in the next life.
notifications.body: Maybe it's a good thing, I'll be fed in the next life.

notifications.title: Do you think there's food in heaven?
notifications.body: Do you think there's food in heaven? Then I could finally eat again and maybe get loved a bit...
